item.description:
We are planning weather permitting to walk Boston's Freedom trail if the temperature is over 40 degrees. If it is under 40 degrees we will be going to The Isabell Stewart Gardner museum. We will probably do an inexpensive lunch during our outing. We are planning
a four hour time frame. We will all meet at one place or the other at 11 am. Wear good walking shoes and dress warmly if we are going to be outside.
The event is open to everyone and their guests. Any questions, email me at winner525@aol.com or call 781-367-5674 cell
Helane Broad
item.name: Freedom Trail Walk Saturday February 2 at 11 am.
